entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump I thought this was a coronavirus conference.  Sounds like Orange Boy is still whining.  Can we just send him back to the bunker where he doesn't look and sound like a moron?

Fauci doesn't have polling numbers, shit for brains.
